import React from 'react'; import "../../Css/Education.css" import Moment from 'react-moment'; const Education = ({education}) => (
{education.map(edu =>( ))}
Company Job Location From To
{edu.institute} {edu.degree} {edu.location} {edu.from} {edu.to === null ? ('Now'):( {edu.to})}
); export default Education;
